name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WordPress Theme Detector and Plugin Detector

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WordPress Theme Detector can detect installed WordPress Themes and WordPress Plugins on the Website you are currently viewing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free WordPress Theme Detector can detect the installed WordPress themes and WordPress plugins on the website you are currently viewing.

This extension is extremely fast because it does not use your browser performance. For detecting purpose, we use only our very fast server-side API.

If you are viewing a WordPress site, the extension icon turns blue, if the current website doesnâ€™t have WordPress, the extension icon will turn grey.
